wikipedia_page.main: John McCluskey (23 January 1944 – 17 July 2015) born in Hamilton, South Lanarkshire, was a Scottish amateur flyweight and professional fly/bantam/featherweight boxer of the 1960s and 1970s.

*John McCluskey, 71, Scottish Olympic boxer (1964).Hamilton Boxing Legend John McCluskey passes away aged 71
Veerapan Komolsen (born 16 March 1946) is a Thai boxer. He competed in the men's flyweight event at the 1964 Summer Olympics. At the 1964 Summer Olympics, he lost to John McCluskey of Great Britain.
